features: 【Fresh Your Home - High Efficiency HEPA Air Filter】This H13 HEPA filter air purifiers cleans off 99.97% of airborne contaminants, reduces and absorbs those via true HEPA filter. AMEIFU air purifiers for home suitable for large rooms up to 1740 sq ft, perfect for quickly cleaning a wide range of contaminants including pet dander, smoke, and bad smells in a certain space.

【No Annoyed Noise - Ensure your Sleep】Air Purifiers for bedroom runs at very low noise level (≤15dB) on the lowest speed and the sleep mode, the quiet HEPA air purifier cleans the air without noise pollution. You can run it all night long without disturbing your sleep. Put one in your child's bedroom, they'll hardly notice it is there, enable you and your family to enjoy the fresh and clean air in sweet dream.

【Aromatherapy & Child Lock】Dropping your favorite essential oil (not included) on the aroma pad on top of the air purifiers for home to give a room a pleasant smell or cover up unwanted smells. Considerable child lock design helps avoid babies getting hurt and avoid any random setting changes caused by accident touch. (And the filter replacement remind button will blink when the filter expires to suggest you to replace.)

【Air Quality Display & 5 Timer Function】 Hepa air purifiers for home features 3 fan speeds, or you can choose the auto mode and let it deal with anything nasty in the air automatically. In auto mode, the air purifier fitted with a PM2.5 sensor to display how dirty the air is and show it on the touch panel. Timer function is conveniently adjusted between 2, 4, 6, 8 or 12 hours and good for energy saving.

【Safe and Trusted Official Certification】This air purifiers for large room is 100% no ozone with CE , FCC certification to ensure your safe use, which also complying with the California Air Resources Board (CARB), the air purifiers for home and pets is of good quality to ensure your health. We recommend replacing the filter every 3-6 months to ensure optimum performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far its been amazing. I had (key word) another purifier on other side of the house but a different brand. Well it crapped out on day 90. So I ordered another one of these. I have a 2400sqft home and have (2) of these running and its like night and day! The furnace filters are even showing less crud because these work so well!Highly recommended and even going to be purchasing 1 as a gift for my dad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST!! FINALLY FIGURED OUT RESET BUTTON FOR FILTER!!!
reviews.reviewText: I FIGURED OUT THE FILTER RESET BUTTON! I’m an idiot and had it plugged into an extension cord instead of directly into an outlet. THAT’S THE PROBLEM! Must plug directly into outlet for all the buttons and functions to work properly! I’m sure there’s other customers that have it plugged into an extension cord like myself.? WILL NOT WORK CORRECTLY IF NOT PLUGGED IN DIRECTLY TO AN OUTLET. No extension cords!!!!!I love this product! It is very quiet and works great! I plugged it in and within a few minutes I couldn’t smell my cat box anymore!! I’ve tried everything to get rid of the smell and even scoop my box multiple times a day and this is the ONLY product that has completely eliminated the smell!! Great price and great value!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Open the back...remove plastic from filter.
reviews.reviewText: I thought it was loud until I opened the back and removed the plastic from the filter. Now it seems to work great, moves a fair bit of air. Be smarter than I was. 😊Nice looking unit, medium size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works great! Very quiet but will get louder when it’s trying to rid of any smells such as cooking. Once the odor is gone, it quiets itself again. Love this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and best customer service ever!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently had the pleasure of dealing with Ameifu company support for my air purifier needs, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. From the moment I reached out, Joshua provided lightning-fast responses to my emails, showcasing a level of customer service that truly sets them apart.Not only do they offer top-notch customer support, but the quality of the equipment I purchased exceeded my expectations. The website's live chat feature also made the process seamless, offering real-time assistance whenever I needed it.I was initially confused about the various air purifier models and needed the right replacement filter. The support team went above and beyond to guide me through the options, ensuring I found the perfect fit for my needs. Their expertise and patience made the entire process stress-free.Overall, this company has earned my trust and loyalty with their outstanding service and exceptional product quality. I wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone in need of reliable air purification solutions. A well-deserved 5 stars! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Awesome but filters get expensive
reviews.reviewText: Totally my fault for not realizing that this needed replacement filters and they were not reusable filters. I do think that this works great, just not for the space that it claims to be good for. I used it in my 12X12 room and it worked great there, but in my living room which is around 24X36, it didn’t work well at all. It isn’t loud at all and you can put scented oil in to help blow smell around, but it is a little difficult to clean out the spot for oil and it only came with one oil cushion so if your oils do not match, you will get a strange smell from the diffuser part. It is a great concept, but I wouldn’t buy this again unless it came with a reusable filter that you can clean and if there were several cushions for oil or another way to deliver the oil. If these issues don’t bother or worry you, then this is a great buy. It really does pick up dust and grime. I would just rather get one more economically friendly and that didn't cause more plastic in our landfills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make a constant moan
reviews.reviewText: Filters very good but makes a constant moan sound after two week use, even after changing filter I am assuming the fan motor needs oiled, there is no way to do that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power Performance in a Compact Purifier
reviews.reviewText: I was looking forward to using this, and it has NOT disappointed. It is a compact purifier that comes with even advanced features at its price point, offering more powerful output than some larger models. The automatic features work smoothly, and you have plenty of options to adjust them to your liking. Includes the carbon filter, which is super helpful for odors and pet dander. Goes in our room, and I've noticed better sleep after having turned this on as well.
